net.finmath.smartcontract.product.xml
 

  • Uses of RelativeDateOffset in net.finmath.smartcontract.product.xml

    Subclasses of RelativeDateOffset in net.finmath.smartcontract.product.xml
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AdjustedRelativeDateOffset
    A type defining a date (referred to as the derived date) as a relative offset from another date (referred to as the anchor date) plus optional date adjustments.
    class 
    RelativeDates
    A type describing a set of dates defined as relative to another set of dates.
